title: Angela Zhao
text: Angela Zhao is a first year PhD student in Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins University. Her favourite animal is the spherical cow. When reality gets too messy, assume everything is perfectly round and frictionless.

title: About
text:
Johns Hopkins University
PhD in Biostatistics (In progress)
ScM in Biostatistics (2024)
McGill University
BS in Joint Honours Computer Science and Biology, Minor in Mathematics (2022)

title: About
text:
Research Interests

Functional data analysis/time-series modeling
Domain-specific applications to wearable device and imaging data

title: About
text:
Hobbies

Bouldering, stand-up comedy, and playing classical music (fun fact: she taught piano for 4 years).
